description: Insert description of the world/game here.

Alpha.description:
First alpha build. Playable, but not everything is optimal.
For instructions please visit the "Total War Warhammer 3" discord channel in the Archipelago/future-game-design discord.

Please report bugs, wrong items and suggestions here:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1s6_o5NYqMQfw0eofOkz_dGD3NKrRU67usfcVNOc0yKo/edit?usp=sharing
Alpha.title: TWW3 Archipelago Alpha v.0.0.1

Alpha_0.0.2.description:
Fixed a sign flip which prevented the correct starting tier for buildings being included in the item pool.
Also Fixed Technologies being in the item pool again
Alpha_0.0.2.title: TWW3 Archipelago Alpha v.0.0.2

Alpha_0.0.3.description:
In an attempt to set settlements closer together, I messed up the calculation of the distance to the player and therefore the spheres.
In this release, this should be fixed.
Also added counter for spheres to the client.

Thank you
Alpha_0.0.3.title: TWW3 Archipelago Alpha v.0.0.3

Alpha_0.0.4.description:
With this release comes the option to use progressive Buildings.
Now Settlement Tier 1 should be unlocked before Settlement Tier 2 etc.
This function is compatible with Starting Tier Function.
Alpha_0.0.4.title: Alpha_0.0.4 Progressive Buildings

Alpha_0.0.5_Progressive_Units.description: Progressive Units are now available. Try it out.
Alpha_0.0.5_Progressive_Units.title: Alpha_0.0.5 Progressive Units

Alpha_0.0.7_Sphere_Balancing.description:
Added an option to set a required amount of unlocks per sphere before the logic expects you to go further.
Added an option to set max range during settlement shuffle. If after 10 loops of settlement shuffle, some settlements are still without owner, than the max range will be set to allow any distance.
Alpha_0.0.7_Sphere_Balancing.title: Alpha_0.0.7 Sphere Balancing and Max Range

Alpha_0.0.8_Progressive_Tech.description:
- Added progressive Technologies for each faction
- Garisson should now be at full health at the beginning of the game
- Fixed the calculation of the max_items available so that the Sphere Balancing feature is not restricted and can be set to "0" to use the maximum amount of items available in the item pool for sphere balancing.
Alpha_0.0.8_Progressive_Tech.title: Alpha_0.0.8 Progressive Technology

Beta_0.1.1_Woodelves_Nakai_Changeling_Cl.description:
- Force Woodelve factions to have at least one forest settlement.
- Fixed Units and Buildings for Nakai and Changeling.
- Fixed an Error resulting in doubling the amount of Orbs and Spheres when reconnecting with the Client.
- Installation path should now be saved. See Instructions down below.

If you first connect to a TWW3 World, then the Client will open a file browser. Navigate to the Folder of the TWW3 Installation e.g.: "I:/SteamLibrary/steamapps/common/Total War WARHAMMER III". See if the Client prints out any errors. If the Client prints out, that it could not found the Warhammer3.exe, than ignore that message and see, if an engine.in file is successfully written in the TWW3 Installation folder. If it is, everything works as expected. If you choose the wrong folder, navigate to your Archipelago installation folder and open the host.yaml. Search for "tww3_path" and set the path to the right folder path or delete it completely and set the path via the file browser after your next connection to a tww3 world.
Beta_0.1.1_Woodelves_Nakai_Changeling_Cl.title: Beta 0.1.1 Woodelves, Nakai, Changeling + Reconnect Fix + Installation Path save

Beta_0.1.2_Option_Fix_Removed_mounts_set.description:
- Fixed a problem in the client, that cause items not to generate but block buildings ingame if progressive_unit/building/tech was on, but shuffle_unit/building/tech was off.
- Removed Mounts from item pool, because they could not be used by most other characters
- Removed Ruins from item Pool and set the Tier 1 Settlement in the right place to fix the settlement building lagging one tier behind other buildings in combination with starting tier option or progressive buildings.

This apworld is not compatible with old games from the old apworld, since item ids changes. Please only update to this version if you are planning to play a new game.
Also if you want to continue a game, that is suffering from the first problem mentioned above, please dm me to ask for help or ask in the discord and we can try to fix your game.

As always, have fun and don't forget to report bugs :D
Beta_0.1.2_Option_Fix_Removed_mounts_set.title: Beta 0.1.2 Option Fix, Removed Mounts, Settlement Fix

Beta_0.1.3_Woodelve_Tech_Fix_Port_Tier_f.description:
- Fixed Port Tiers, so that they start from Tier 0 like the other buildings.
- Unified Wood Elve Technologies, so that WE only have 1 progressive Item Group for Technologies and not 5.
- Fixed a calculation error that resulted in more items than locations.

It is a rather insignificant update to most of you so I would not risk breaking old saves if you want to continue them albeit it should be compatible.
Beta_0.1.3_Woodelve_Tech_Fix_Port_Tier_f.title: Beta 0.1.3 Woodelve Tech Fix, Port Fix

Beta_0.1.4_progressive_item_fix.description: - Fix for progressive items table not being recalculated if the client disconnects and reconnects again.
Beta_0.1.4_progressive_item_fix.title: Beta 0.1.4 Progressive Item Fix

Beta_0.1.5_new_options_and_fixes.description:
- Added experimental options for Bonus Spheres and Orbs
- Added experimental option to replace Movie traps with other traps
- Fixed Norscan and Woodelves Outpost structures, which are now correctly beginning at tier 0 and not tier 1
- Fixed /traps command, which should now correctly enable and disable traps
- Shroud now correctly resets at the beginning of a game
Beta_0.1.5_new_options_and_fixes.title: Beta 0.1.5 New Options and Fixes

Beta_0.1_Rituals_Personalities_Traps_Fil.title: Beta 0.1 Rituals, Personalities, Traps and Fillers

Beta_0.1_Rituals_Personalities_Traps_Fil.description:
A lot of those features are complex and are in need of testing.
Please be aware, that this is a beta and please ask questions and report bugs in the discord channel. Thank you.

Write "/toggleTraps" in the Client to deactivate traps and load an old save if Traps destroyed your save file and you want to recover it.

- Added Ritual shuffle. Rituals in this sense are faction specific game mechanics, not only classic rituals.
- Added 5 weak filler, 3 strong filler, 2 harmless traps, 4 weak traps and 3 strong traps for now.
- Under the filler items are items that give one out of ~4000 effect bundles to the player and one out of ~600 ancillaries.
- Added AI Personality Shuffle.
Beta_0.1_Rituals_Personalities_Traps_Fil.title: Beta 0.1 Rituals, Personalities, Traps and Fillers
